title: Bubble 'n' squeak
ingredients: ['1 medium head green cabbage', '500g (1 1/4 lb) potatoes, peeled and diced', '250g (9 oz) green vegetables such as broccoli, spinach or Brussels sprouts', '1 large onion, peeled and sliced', '1 tablespoon olive oil, divided', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
